d56b056d-3ecb-4933-b3f4-b13c67b635b7.description: The WorkPacks End User certification demonstrates mastery and efficiency in the daily work processes, features, and functionalities of WorkPacks, a modern SaaS solution for Advanced Work Packaging. Certification is open to professionals in a variety of roles, including AWP, Project Controls, Engineering, Procurement, Construction, and Owners. The WorkPacks End User certification is a significant accomplishment and a valuable asset for anyone engaged in capital projects.
d56b056d-3ecb-4933-b3f4-b13c67b635b7.name: WorkPacks Certified End User

badge_template_activities.title: Our comprehensive training program includes lecture-based coaching, AWP training modules, and hands-on workshops to ensure mastery of WorkPacks. Training covers all AWP work processes, from Early Path of Construction Planning and POC automation to detailed work packaging, constraint management, status visualization, and field mobility. The program culminates with a hands-on exam for WorkPacks End User certification.

9a312ee5-d83d-424d-a6aa-1becb2a4a3f1.description: The WorkPacks Delta Certified Data Admin is available to AWP IT/IM personnel worldwide. The certification demonstrates mastery of WorkPacks Delta, the data integration platform driving WorkPacks. The program allows users to tailor their training to their specific AWP work processes and needs. Optional coaching ensures adequate knowledge for optimal use of WorkPacks Delta in configuring and performing data integrations for WorkPacks AWP solutions.
9a312ee5-d83d-424d-a6aa-1becb2a4a3f1.name: WorkPacks Delta Certified Data Admin

badge_template_activities.title: Our comprehensive training program includes lecture-based coaching, robust data admin training modules linked to key AWP work processes, and in-depth, hands-on workshops to ensure mastery of configuring and managing AWP projects in WorkPacks and WorkPacks Delta. The program culminates with a hands-on exam for WorkPacks Delta Certified Data Admin certification.
